title: Why wait for the M4 Mac Mini when the M2 Pro is $200 off right now
content:
Macworld

We all know that a new Mac mini is coming soon, but the current model is still a great option for anyone who wants a great computer without taking over a ton of space—especially when it’s on sale: Amazon is selling the M2 Pro Mac mini for $1.099, a savings of $200 and a great deal on a great machine.

Despite its powerful chip, the M2 Pro Mac mini is small, silent, and powerful, like you wouldn’t believe. You can easily turn it into a multitasking machine by hooking up to three displays at the same time—the device supports two 6K displays at 60Hz via Thunderbolt and another 4K/60Hz monitor via HDMI.

The M2 Pro offers great performance, although there’s really no comparison between the new model and the older Intel versions. We reviewed the Mac Mini with the M2 Pro chip and gave it a four-star rating. “The upgrade to the M2 Pro, as well as display output and wireless upgrades, made this more than a worthy successor to the aging Intel-based Mac mini,” the review reads.

Our main gripe with this product was its price, but that’s not an issue with this deep discount now available at Amazon. Therefore, forget the M4 FOMO and grab the Mac Mini for $1,099 while you still can.

This tiny PC is very powerful and has a great price
